home.description: I'm a front-end developer passionate about creating amazing and intuitive user experiences. My focus is on building modern and responsive interfaces using the latest web technologies.

2020.title: The Beginning
2020.description: Well, when I was about 13 years old, I started to notice the digital world. I would visit a website and think: okay, how is a website made? How do things work behind the scenes? Then I came across that name you know: Curso Em Video! That's right, from there I started studying HTML5 and CSS3.

2021.title: Learning Improvement
2021.description: In 2021, I already had a basic understanding of how it worked. I created very simple pages, I would see a photo and try to replicate it, and from there I kept evolving. I also tried to do projects without watching YouTube videos, which made it quite difficult but also helped me a lot because of learning on my own.

2022.title: The Contact
2022.description: Well, this is known as: The Contact, because of my first contact with JavaScript. I remember it like it was yesterday, always super excited to learn. From there, I started solving basic programming problems. And my practices with HTML and CSS were pretty good, I could replicate any type of website, well, of course not as functional because they were simple, but I could do it.

2023.title: Shooting for Other Sides
2023.description: This was a year when I wasn't so focused on JavaScript, I also tried PHP! And it was awesome! I managed to make a website that did registration and login in a game that worked on my computer, as its databases were in SQL, so it was easier to do, but of course, it was a challenge, I didn't know anything about PHP.

2024.title: Modern Technologies
2024.description: Well, in 2024 I got a new PC, and then I managed to improve my skills with some more modern technologies like ReactJS. I studied for a few months with this technology, and I managed to learn a lot with it, as well as other knowledge like TailwindCSS, Animate.css Scroll Driven and others.
